alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 2:27PM EDT until March 28 at 1:41AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Milledgeville affecting Baldwin, Washington and Wilkinson Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Milledgeville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River at Milledgeville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 30 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand further into the woodlands and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage near the Georgia Highway 22 and 24 bridge. Fishing Creek backs up and a few buildings along the creek will be flooded. Also Tanyard Branch Stream between East Thomas and East Charleston Streets in Milledgeville will flood. Sinclair Dam will likely have four to five gates open to reach this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EDT Monday the stage was 29.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 22 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
